h2_title: North Shore of the Bitter Lake
content: The good news is Zhu Bajie has now agreed to accompany you, and despite his size, the little pig is a handy follower to have. Not only is he pretty adept with his rake weapon, and can also belch poison at enemies, he can also expel a healing mist to help you recover your health and save on using your gourd!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'North Shore of the Bitter Lake'.
The content is as follows:
The good news is Zhu Bajie has now agreed to accompany you, and despite his size, the little pig is a handy follower to have. Not only is he pretty adept with his rake weapon, and can also belch poison at enemies, he can also expel a healing mist to help you recover your health and save on using your gourd!
